title: Since I Was Reborn as Saito Yoshitatsu, I’m Aiming to Hand Over the Territory to Oda Nobunaga and Live Longer! - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Historical   Mature   Seinen   Supernatural
tags: Age Progression   Ancient Times   Calm Protagonist   Cheats   Depictions of Cruelty   Domestic Affairs   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   R-15   Reincarnation   Schemes And Conspiracies
author: Tatsumi Mirai   巽未頼
description:
A modern day doctor who died from overwork was reborn as Oda Nobunaga’s early rival, Saito Yoshitatsu.

He died young at the age of 33, and he was not able to stand his life as an enemy of Oda Nobunaga. So his goal is to hand over his territory to Oda Nobunaga and try hard to aim for long and comfortable life.

However, he was afraid of his father, Saito Dosan, and worried that he wouldn’t be able to resist him.>
